titleInfo.title: Annah Early, member of Evergreen Presbyterian Church, 1979

mods.abstract: This is an interview of Miss Annah Lee Early. Early tells the story of her church's history, which later becomes Evergreen Presbyterian Church. She also discusses the experiences she encountered in the church, and current race relations and community service at Evergreen Presbyterian.
